content: this fresh and modern knit sweater features a pretty lace pattern along the yoke designed in caron angel cakes the body is worked in the round in simple stocking stitch we ve given it a springtime vibe in the designer s shade but this garment would look just as attractive in any color that brings out the lacework detail style is flattering on most body types so this pattern is offered in a range of sizes materials sizes u s 6 4 mm and u s 7 4 5 mm circular knitting needles 16 40 5 cm and 36 91 5 cm long set of 4 sizes u s 6 4 mm and u s 7 4 5 mm double-pointed knitting needles to fit bust measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm finished bust xs/s 38 1/2 98 cm m 41 1/2 105 5 cm l 45 1/2 115 5 cm xl 49 1/2 125 5 cm 2/3xl 57 145 cm 4/5xl 65 165 cm also in softee baby cotton /yarns/library/bernat-softee-baby-cotton https //www yarnspirations com/bernat-nice-and-lacy-yoke-knit-tee/brk0140-032922m html utm_source=ravelry&utm_medium=referral
